testcase.name: Verify that user can send get request to retrieve all skills data
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request with authorization for Skills API...................passed When User sends GET request for Skills API..................................passed Then User should get status code "200",valid response body and json schema validated for successful Skills-GET request.passed

testcase.name: Verify that user can send get request to retrieve single user skills data
testcase.system-out: Given User sets request with authorization for Skills API...................passed When User sends GET request for single Userid Skills from "getsingleskills" and 0.passed Then User should get status code "200",valid response body and json schema validated for successful Skills-GET request for Single User.passed
